\subsubsection[{on\-\_\-title\-\_\-changed}]{\setlength{\rightskip}{0pt plus 5cm}{\bf sigma\-::core\-::\-Callback\-Interface}$<$ Task$\ast$, const chaos\-::uni\-::\-U\-T\-F8\-String\&, const chaos\-::uni\-::\-U\-T\-F8\-String\&$>$$\ast$ sigma\-::core\-::tasks\-::\-Task\-::on\-\_\-title\-\_\-changed (
\begin{DoxyParamCaption}
{}
\end{DoxyParamCaption}
)\hspace{0.3cm}{\ttfamily [inline]}}}\label{group___member_gafb01222cabc945022f095921437a10a0}


For registering callbacks that handle when a \hyperlink{classsigma_1_1core_1_1tasks_1_1_task}{Task} has its title attribute changed. 

Relevant callback functions take three arguments\-:
\begin{DoxyItemize}
\item {\ttfamily Task$\ast$} -\/ the \hyperlink{classsigma_1_1core_1_1tasks_1_1_task}{Task} thats title has changed.
\item {\ttfamily const chaos\-::uni\-::\-U\-T\-F8\-String\&} -\/ the previous title of the \hyperlink{classsigma_1_1core_1_1tasks_1_1_task}{Task}.
\item {\ttfamily const chaos\-::uni\-::\-U\-T\-F8\-String\&} -\/ the new title of the \hyperlink{classsigma_1_1core_1_1tasks_1_1_task}{Task}. 
\end{DoxyItemize}\hypertarget{group___member_ga4947e26b1208f36cf4bab3f2091db786}{\index{Callbacks wat@{Callbacks wat}!on\-\_\-parent\-\_\-changed@{on\-\_\-parent\-\_\-changed}}
\index{on\-\_\-parent\-\_\-changed@{on\-\_\-parent\-\_\-changed}!Callbacks wat@{Callbacks wat}}
\subsubsection[{on\-\_\-parent\-\_\-changed}]{\setlength{\rightskip}{0pt plus 5cm}{\bf sigma\-::core\-::\-Callback\-Interface}$<$Task$\ast$, Task$\ast$, Task$\ast$$>$$\ast$ sigma\-::core\-::tasks\-::\-Task\-::on\-\_\-parent\-\_\-changed (
\begin{DoxyParamCaption}
{}
\end{DoxyParamCaption}
)\hspace{0.3cm}{\ttfamily [inline]}}}\label{group___member_ga4947e26b1208f36cf4bab3f2091db786}


For registering callbacks that handle when a \hyperlink{classsigma_1_1core_1_1tasks_1_1_task}{Task} has its parent attribute changed. 

Relevant callback functions take three arguments\-:
\begin{DoxyItemize}
\item {\ttfamily Task$\ast$} -\/ The \hyperlink{classsigma_1_1core_1_1tasks_1_1_task}{Task} thats parent has changed.
\item {\ttfamily Task$\ast$} -\/ The previous parent of the \hyperlink{classsigma_1_1core_1_1tasks_1_1_task}{Task}.
\item {\ttfamily Task$\ast$} -\/ The new parent of the \hyperlink{classsigma_1_1core_1_1tasks_1_1_task}{Task}.
\end{DoxyItemize}

\begin{DoxyNote}{Note}
If the new parent is null this \hyperlink{classsigma_1_1core_1_1tasks_1_1_task}{Task} is about to be destroyed. 
\end{DoxyNote}
